document.full_text: country music great ferlin husky, a pioneer in both the hard-twang bakersfield and lushly produced nashville sounds who scored his biggest hit with the ballad "gone," died on thursday at age 85.
document.title: country singer ferlin husky dies at 85
lines_and_colors: country music great ferlin husky, a pioneer in both the hard-twang bakersfield and lushly produced nashville sounds who scored his biggest hit with the ballad "gone," died on thursday at age 85.
